title: Game will not connect after repeated clicks on Reconnect (Issue after Issue)
body: I've had 20 min LPQ due to an issue prior to this because my client had to keep "repairing" itself so I do not know what to do at this current moment and now my LPQ will get longer and I definitely do not want that but I do not mind the wait so please help!!!

replies.body:
I definitely don't want you to keep getting hit with LPQ's, so let's be sure to take a step back and troubleshoot this in some custom games before diving back into any matchmade queues. 

If your client keeps trying to repair a previous patch but fails to do so since it needs to try and repair it again and again, we may need to make sure that the patch is being installed correctly. Grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with a **Force Repatch** and that should be able to get the patch working again.
